comment_data.body: is this the only actual change? the changes to `doc/configs.txt` and `doc/configs.md` should be reverted
comment_data.diff_hunk:
@@ -17,8 +17,8 @@ To use with nvim:
 
 1. Install a Rust toolchain: https://rustup.rs
 2. Clone the repo
-3. Run `cargo build --release --bin lang-srv`
-4. Move `target/release/lang-srv` to somewhere on your $PATH as `millet`
+3. Run `cargo build --release --bin millet-ls`
+4. Move `target/release/millet-ls` to somewhere on your $PATH as `millet`

comment_regular_data.body: Note that `configs.md` or `configs.txt` will be regenerated by the docgen CI process. Edit the Lua source file instead. For details on generating documentation, see: https://github.com/neovim/nvim-lspconfig/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#generating-docs
